Login with Google Login with Facebook Are you station owner? Login successful. You are redirecting to the app… There was an error logging in. Please try again later… Login was canceled by user…
Welcome to FuelSpot! FuelSpot is the platform which you can track gas prices, recent news in addition to vehicle track (average consumption, emission…) and many more! Account created. We need some permission to nearest stations to you! Continue Do you have a car? Yes No Brand Model Primary fuel type Gasoline Diesel LPG Distance Electricity Secondary fuel type If you don\'t have secondary fuel system, leave this empty Kilometer Plate no Fuel symbols By clicking symbols you can order station by your choice (price or distance). Got it! How to register my car? You can add your vehicle clicking add new vehicle button on your profile. To earn bonus, don\'t forget to add your car! How to add fuel? When you go to station, FuelSpot will detect it and send notification. Follow instruction and get your bonus! Your info saved. Welcome to FuelSpot! Please enter your plate no This plate no has been added to system… Automobile added An error occurred. Please try again later… Location info fetching… Permission denied…
